mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, ID, REF, STEP, DEPTH, TITLE, CONTENT, WDATE, PARENT, DEL, READCOUNT FROM SISTBBS ORDER BY REF DESC, STEP ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SISTBBS (SEQ, ID, REF, STEP, DEPTH, TITLE, CONTENT, WDATE, PARENT, DEL, READCOUNT) VALUES(SEQ_SISTBBS.nextval, #{id}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(REF), 0)+1 FROM SISTBBS), 0, 0, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 0, 0, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, ID, REF, STEP, DEPTH, TITLE, CONTENT, WDATE, PARENT, DEL, READCOUNT FROM SISTBBS WHERE SEQ=#{seq}

SELECT NVL(count(*), 0) AS cnt FROM SISTBBS WHERE 1=1
AND TITLE like '%'||#{s_keyword}||'%'
AND CONTENT like '%'||#{s_keyword}||'%'
mapper.update: UPDATE SISTBBS SET STEP=STEP+1 WHERE REF=(SELECT REF FROM SISTBBS WHERE SEQ=#{seq}) AND STEP>(SELECT STEP FROM SISTBBS WHERE SEQ=#{seq})
